coreAttributes.authorTag: "MFD DSG Plumbing Supply" is printed on the grip.
coreAttributes.name: cardboard sword
coreAttributes.description: With a blade of cardboardium alloy folded a thousand times over and a hilt of finest PVC pipe, this sword is light and well-balanced. You'd be hard pressed to do any real damage with it though.

extraEffects.effect: Makes the wielder look like a dork...

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] sword at [npc2.name]! The edge of the mighty cardboardium blade makes contact with [npc2.namePos] aura, draining a miniscule amount of energy.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] sword at [npc2.name] but an errant current of air causes [npc.her] to miss...
